name: Mango Lassi
description: This recipe comes from the cookbook author Madhur Jaffrey, who said, 'Mangoes are supposed to be good for the eyes.'
ingredients: One-Fourth cup fresh or canned mango pulp
directions: Place all ingredients in a blender and puree until smooth.
Garnish with a pinch of ground cardamom seeds.
A few extra ice cubes may be added when serving.
